personal.name: Your Name
personal.title: Graphic Designer & Creative Artist
personal.tagline: Transforming ideas into stunning visual experiences
personal.bio: I'm a passionate graphic designer with over 5 years of experience creating compelling visual stories. My work spans branding, digital design, and print media, always focusing on delivering creative solutions that resonate with audiences.

services.title: Brand Identity
services.description: Creating memorable brand identities that capture your essence and connect with your audience.

services.title: UI/UX Design
services.description: Designing intuitive and beautiful user interfaces that enhance user experience and engagement.

services.title: Print Design
services.description: Crafting stunning print materials from brochures to packaging that make a lasting impression.

services.title: Illustration
services.description: Custom illustrations that bring your stories to life with unique artistic flair.

portfolio.title: Modern Brand Identity
portfolio.description: Complete brand identity design for a tech startup including logo, color palette, and brand guidelines.

portfolio.title: Mobile App UI Design
portfolio.description: Clean and intuitive mobile app interface design for a fitness tracking application.

portfolio.title: Magazine Layout
portfolio.description: Editorial design for a lifestyle magazine featuring modern typography and clean layouts.

portfolio.title: Product Packaging
portfolio.description: Eco-friendly packaging design for an organic skincare brand with minimalist aesthetics.

portfolio.title: Website Redesign
portfolio.description: Complete website redesign for an e-commerce platform focusing on user experience and conversion.

portfolio.title: Social Media Campaign
portfolio.description: Creative social media graphics and campaign materials for a fashion brand launch.
